burlap.datastructures

Class HashedAggregator<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.datastructures.HashedAggregator<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key, which must be hashable.

    public class HashedAggregator<K>
extends java.lang.Object
    Datasturcutre for maintaining numeric aggregated values for different keys. If the value has never been queried or added to before, then it assumes an initial value (zero by default). The values are backed by a HashMap.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The initial value for each key

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(K ind,
       double v)
        Adds a specified value to a key. If the key has not been index previously, its new value is this object's initialValue datamember + v.
        Parameters:
        ind - the key index
        v - the value to add to the value associated with ind.

      • v

        public double v(K ind)
        The current value associated with key ind. This object's initialValue datamember is returned if nothing has been added to this value previously.
        Parameters:
        ind - the key index
        Returns:
        the value associated with the key index.
